When planning your holidays in Kapparis you have to take in consideration not only the location, but also the best accommodation that will provide you and your party with value for money according to your requirements. 

If you are looking to get away from it all and relax with your family in privacy, than a holiday villa could be a good choice for you. By renting a private villa you will have your own kitchen, living/dining room, bedroom and in many cases your own private swimming pool. Renting a villa provides you with more space and privacy and is also a more economical option rather than staying at a small hotel room. 

A villa can usually accommodate a minimum of 4 people, and the rental price is charged per week making it more cost-effective than staying at a hotel.
